Popular State Management Libraries

Some developers prefer using state management libraries to manage the state of their applications more effectively. This allows you to separate your application logic from the UI layer, making it easier to reason about your code and manage complex state changes.

  • NgRx
  • RxAngular

Other Libraries

  • ngxtension, offers a collection of useful extensions that you might be writing yourself.
  • ngx-translate, provides internationalization (i18n) support for your Angular applications.
  • ng-openapi-gen, generates Angular services from OpenAPI specifications.
